onSuccess.displayText:
With gratitude swelling in his chest, {Player} decided to stay a while longer and help the villagers with their daily tasks. From tending crops to {Random:cooking humble meals with limited ingredients|fishing by the lake|keeping the children entertained}, he learned much about the lives of common folk.

Their yearly struggles and quiet perseverance instilled in him a renewed conviction, that as the future king of {Kingdom#Name}, he must strive to build a realm where people like those of {VillageName} could live without hardship.

When dawn came again, with the elderâ€™s guidance and newfound understanding of the forest, {Player} gathered his belongings and set out toward {Forest1}, ready to uncover the truths that awaited him.
